title: Integrating Educational Technology and Learning Theories: Evidence-Based Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and comprehension of general societal issues
context.additional_context: Learners engage in projects that solve real-world societal problems using various digital devices, experiencing the effective integration of technological tools and the application of learning theories.

learning_goals: Learners can design real-world social problem-solving projects using educational technology tools.
Learners can apply major learning theories (e.g., constructivism, behaviorism) to project design.
Learners can evaluate and incorporate the effectiveness of technology tools based on evidence-based design principles.

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Notion)
Open Dataset for Social Issue Resolution

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
